name: Cosmic Conga
description:
Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 30  in August 2014

Cosmic Conga is a fast paced strategy game that may… or may not be, balanced 😛

I stress ‘balanced’ as I’ve spent so much time testing this build I’m not entirely sure what constitutes ‘difficult’ anymore 😛

How to Play

  • You are Green
  • Click and drag to send resources from one planet to another
  • Resources sent to a neutral or hostile planet deplete that planet's resources, and when 0 becomes captured
  • Each captured planet will generate resources
  • Win by balancing production and aggression to capture all planets on the map

Source Code

Unity project including source and assets can be found on github:
https://github.com/Almax27/LD30-Cosmic-Conga
